page.title: 05Home Life in Beckermet
page.content: I live on a farm with my younger brother, mother and father.I get up about 6 a.m. and dress myself in socks, pants, T-shirt and trousers.I go down stairs for my breakfast. After washing myself in the bathroom I go and feed our Springer Spaniel pup and his mother then I go and put the ponies into the paddock behind our house. After that I feed the hens and let them out of the hen house for a run. Next I muck out the stables and fill the hay nets for the ponies at night. After lunch I go up stairs and practice my music -treble and descant recorders.Then I get my saddle and bridle and put them on my pony. I go for a ride round Ponsonby Tarn.When I return I take all his tack off and put him back in the paddock. Then I have my tea.
